text: Nice food on our first visit! Restaurant was full after some time. Better make a reservation. Family members felt thirsty after the meal hence may not revisit.

My go-to place for chilli crab cravings!

Never disappoints. Service is fast, and food quality is always consistent... even tho it's a reduced/modified CNY menu.

Thoroughly enjoyed every dish.

🍚🥢 Uncle Leong Seafood
*****************************
🟨 15, Lorong 8 Toa Payoh, #01-01 Braddell Tech,  Singapore 319262

❇️ My hubby had gone to Lorong 8 to dapao 打包 ( takeaway) Ngoh Hiang 五香卷+ Mee Goreng 印度面 for tonight's dinner from Uncle Leong Seafood restaurant.

🟧 We live just several bus stops away from this seafood eatery.● The restaurant is nestled on the ground floor of an industrial building at Lorong 8 Toa Payoh's industrial area.

The food tonight
*********************
🟩 The mee goreng is tasty, but what stands out most is the Ngoh Hiang ( Teochew 五香卷) or Hae Chor in Hokkien. 🌸The pan-fried beancurd-skin prawn-meat rolls are scrumptious.

🟦  The filling of the Ngoh Hiang is a generous composition of minced meat mixed with fish paste, chopped prawns, water chestnuts and bits of scallion. 🩵It is certainly one of the better quality Hae Chor/ Ngoh Hiang I've eaten so far.

❇️ Note =  The restaurant is not air-conditioned, and it is like your usual coffeeshop ambience type of seafood eatery. It has only ceiling fans to keep the place cool.

🥢 Service is generally friendly and efficient. 🟧 The prices are also very reasonable for a good seafood restaurant of this quality.

🟨 I have also included some throwback photos of the dishes we had eaten in the past during family dinner celebrations.

Food serve fast for a full house restaurant. Gave a 3⭐️for service, but staff is polite and friendly. Service staff looks understaff to serve us better. Food taste great, their signature crab is the reason we went and really taste good. Foods Prices and portion is reasonable for small group (3-5pax)

Uncle Leong Seafood is a must-visit for crab lovers! Their chili crabs are outstanding—huge and meaty, with 1.2 kg costing under $100. The chili crab sauce is rich and flavorful, perfectly complementing the fresh crab. They also have different type of crab for you to choose. It's a fantastic value for such delicious seafood. The best worth its money zhicha stall.
